head.title: Credit Offerings For Sale This Week

hedline.hl1: Credit Offerings For Sale This Week

block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
American Capital Strategies Inc., Bethesda, Md., 4.5 million shares. Robertson Stephens.
Amphenol Corp., Wallingford, Conn., 6 million class A shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
American Capital Strategies Inc., Bethesda, Md., 4.5 million shares. Robertson Stephens.
Amphenol Corp., Wallingford, Conn., 6 million class A shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
BTU International Inc., North Billerica, Mass., 2.7 million shares. Needham & Co.
Carbo Ceramics Inc., Irving, Tex., 2.5 million shares. Lehman Brothers
iBEAM Broadcasting Corp., Sunnyvale, Calif., an initial public offering of 11 million shares. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
Kensey Nash Corp., Exton, Pa., an initial public offering of 3.2 million shares. Prudential Securities.
New Focus Inc., Santa Clara, Calif., an initial public offering of 5 million shares. CS First Boston.
Nogatech Inc., Santa Clara, Calif., an initial public offering of 3.5 million shares. WR Hambrecht.
Northeast Optic Network Inc., Waltham, Mass., 3 million shares. US Bancorp Piper Jaffray.
Parthus Technologies P.L.C., Dublin, an initial public offering of 13 million American depository shares, each share represents 10 ordinary shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Pixelworks Inc., Tualatin, Ore., an initial public offering of 5.8 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
Transgenomic Inc., Omaha, an initial public offering of 4 million shares. Chase Bank Hambrecht & Quist.
US Unwired Inc., Lake Charles, La., an initial public offering of 8 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Vishay Intertechnology Inc., Malvern, Pa., 5.8 million shares, 4.7 million in the U.S. and Canada. Merrill Lynch & Co.
